text:
补充材料申报方式：
1. 在线办理：微信搜索小程序[EMS邮件代理报关]，或点击链接https://ump.ems.com.cn/ndwz/r/ZFRZB3 登录微信小程序办理。
2. 窗口向海关说明：因邮件集中存放在海关监管区，前往窗口办理业务前，请提前在[EMS邮件代理报关]微信小程序上预约，收到预约成功短信后方可前往现场办理。
邮政代理清关咨询电话：021-64194768 服务时间：周一至周五8:30~10:45 13：00~15:30
trans:
Methods for submitting additional materials:
1. Online Processing: Search for the [EMS Mail Proxy Customs Declaration] mini program on WeChat or click the link https://ump.ems.com.cn/ndwz/r/ZFRZB3 to log into the WeChat mini program for processing.
2. In-person Processing at the Customs Counter: Since the mail is stored in the customs supervision area, you must make an appointment in advance via the [EMS Mail Proxy Customs Declaration] WeChat mini program. You may proceed to the counter only after receiving a confirmation SMS for your appointment.
Postal Agent Customs Clearance Consultation Hotline: 021-64194768 Service Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:30–10:45 and 13:00–15:30
